biotools.summary: An R package for identifying important sources of infection. It implements a non-parametric source attribution model to attribute cases of disease to sources in Bayesian framework with source and type effects.

bioschemas.name: SourceR
bioschemas.summary: An R package for identifying important sources of infection. It implements a non-parametric source attribution model to attribute cases of disease to sources in Bayesian framework with source and type effects.
